title: Military experts warn security hole in most AI chatbots can sow chaos
description: Current and former military officers are warning that countries are likely to exploit a security hole in artificial intelligence chatbots.
content:
Current and former military officers are warning that adversaries are likely to exploit a natural flaw in artificial intelligence chatbots to inject instructions for stealing files, distorting public opinion or otherwise betraying trusted users.

description: The Isle of Palms Police Department is the first city-level police department in the state to try out an artificial intelligence tool that helps them draft incident reports.
content:

title: Profound Medical Regains Exclusive Distribution Rights for TULSA-PRO® in Canada from Knight
description: TORONTO, Nov. 10, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Profound Medical Corp. (NASDAQ:PROF; TSX:PRN) ('Profound” or the 'Company”), a commercial-stage medical device company that develops and markets artificial intelligence ('AI”)-powered, MRI-guided, incision-free therapies for the ablation of diseased tissue, is pleased to announce that it has regained exclusive distribution rights for TULSA-PRO® in Canada from Knight Therapeutics Inc. ('Knight”).

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Wall Street Soars Amid AI Surge and Government Shutdown Progress
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.

title: 'The future of information warfare': Is Australia prepared?
description: Issuing a warning last week, Australia’s spy chief expressed concern about the potential for artificial intelligence to take online radicalisation and disinformation to new levels. Speaking to the spread of false news and violent narratives, Russian operatives were singled out. This growing threat has prompted experts to warn of quote: 'information warfare' If it’s not combatted.
